ix-chart.app_readme:
iX-Chart

iX-chart is a chart designed to let user deploy a docker image in a TrueNAS SCALE kubernetes cluster. It provides a mechanism to specify workload type, add external host interfaces in the pods, configure volumes and allocate host resources to the workload.
ix-chart.description: A Helm chart for deploying simple workloads Kubernetes
ix-chart.name: ix-chart
ix-chart.title: ix-chart
